content:
cds-hooks-bot opened Issue #228

## May 2018 Ballot Comment 22

Submitted by @bvdh from Philips Healthcare

Chapter: CDS Services
Section: Prefetch template
Type: A-S :bulb:
In Person Requested? Yes :bust_in_silhouette:

Existing Wording:

dictionary of read and search requests

Comment:
These two fields are marked as code but do not seem to appear in any of the type definitions. I assume they refer to FHIR read and search operations. If this is the case, we should say so

## Triage Information

Triage Notes:
Reviewed with Bas

Proposed Disposition: Persuasive
Proposed Disposition Comment:
Agreed, we should be clear that they are FHIR read and search interactions. Each should link to the FHIR specification as well.

_This issue was imported by @cds-hooks-bot from the consolidated CDS Hooks May 2018 ballot spreadsheet._

cds-hooks-bot edited Issue #228

Proposed Disposition: Persuasive
Proposed Disposition Comment:
Agreed, we should be clear that they are FHIR read and search interactions. Each should link to the FHIR specification as well.

cds-hooks-bot commented on Issue #228

## :telephone_receiver: CDS Working Group Block Vote (5-30-2018)

Meeting notes: http://wiki.hl7.org/index.php?title=File:2018-05-30_CDS_WG_Call_Minutes.docx

Julia Skapik moved the following disposition, seconded by @brynrhodes.

Disposition: Persuasive
Disposition Comment:
Agreed, we should be clear that they are FHIR read and search interactions. Each should link to the FHIR specification as well.

:+1: For: 12
:expressionless: Abstain: 0
:-1: Against: 0

:tada: The motion passed! :tada:
